ghost.name: Ghost Boar
ghost.description: This boar's love for karaoke combined with its terrible singing skills results in a terrifying experience. Headphones or deafness is recommended.

ice.name: Icy Boar
ice.description: Touching this boar will instantly give you frostbite. Wherever it goes, blizzard-like conditions follow. Found in the heart of glaciers.

birthday.name: Birthday Boar
birthday.description: It is believed that this boar has been partying for eternity. Disturbingly, it has only ever done so by itself as its location is unknown.

normal.name: Normal Boar
normal.description: The original boar, the standard <>immaculate<>Creator Boar<>font<> set and based many of their creations off of. Despite its historical significance, it's still rather unremarkable on its own.

carrot.name: Carrot Boar
carrot.description: On the surface, this boar is indistinguishable from the grass around it. The only being capable of spotting them is <>mythic<>Farmer Boar<>font<>.

sphere.name: Crystal Boarb
sphere.description: This boar inside this orb is said to have time-warping abilities. Encased in crystals, its powers are limited to telling others their future.

creepy.name: Creepy Boar
creepy.description: While it may look strikingly similar to a Normal Boar at first glance, this "boar" is actually a paranormal being that lives inside the skin of those recently deceased.

minimumwage.name: Minimum Wage Boar
minimumwage.description: One of the smartest boars in the universe. Nobody's quite sure why it works at a fast food restaurant, but there must be a reason.

cowboy.name: Cowboar
cowboy.description: This boar has unparalleled skill when it comes to lassoing and piloting horses. It refuses to touch any modern technology.

rickroll.name: Rickroll Boar
rickroll.description: Spreads the word of <>immaculate<>Creator Boar<>font<>. It'll never give you up, nor will it let you down. It certainly won't run around and... desert you.

supernova.name: Suboarnova
supernova.description: Sometimes, stars become this boar after they die out instead of going supernova. It's become a highly researched area of Boarstronomy.

boargalos.name: Boargalos
boargalos.description: An embodiment of pure entropy. Rarely ever seen in its physical form. This <>truth<>Celesticon<>font<> dictates the randomness of events and items.

bacteria.name: Boarcterium
bacteria.description: The first boar ever created by <>immaculate<>Creator Boar<>font<>. Catching a cold from this boar results in explosive symptoms.

underwear.name: Boarnderwear
underwear.description: Children all around the world are disappointed when they open a gift excitedly just to get this boar. It appears as though it's been worn.

spooky.name: Spooky Boar
spooky.description: The suspicious host of <>halloween<>Boar-o-ween<>font<>. He can't go a sentence without rhyming and always seems to have traces of pig hair on his coat.

trophy.name: Trophy Boar
trophy.description: The arch rival of <>rare<>Golden Boar<>font<>, outshining it in every aspect of life. It's hard not to stare at this boar in awe.

santa.name: Santa Boar
santa.description: Every <>christmas<>Boarmas<>font<>, this boar delivers gifts to both young and old! Questioning its identity is highly discouraged.
